descriptionHtml:
Description
===========
I like dogs as followers. I like foxes. I changed ALL dog followers into foxes.


Details
=======
I saw a request somewhere for the follower dogs to be changed into foxes, thus this mod. All I did was change the outward appearance of all follower dogs, (Stray Dogs, Vigilance, and Meeko). Nothing else was changed. Yes, the foxes bark, sit, scratch, take a quick... uh... fox nap; everything the follower dogs did. They have all the same interactions, etc.

If you have a problem with the foxes barking, you can always remove their bark sounds. There is a mod out there somewhere that does that.

They have their mouths open most of the time as the dogs pant with their mouths open a lot. It is just more noticeable with the fox model.

Also, I changed Meeko to be a Snow Fox, because I wanted to have one of those, too.

This mod doesn\'t change the fox texture. The texture in the screenshot is from the awesome mod Real Foxes by Ichibu.  HIGHLY recommended!


As Seen On Youtube!
===================
This mod is featured in the awesome Skyrim Mods Series on Youtube #30!!
Check it out (right around the 4:00 mark) here:
[youtube]OJwXeLE8TGI[/youtube]


Install
=======
Simply extract the file \"DogCompanionsToFoxes.esp\" into your Skyrim/Data folder.


Uninstall
=========
Just remove the \"DogCompanionsToFoxes.esp\" from your Skyrim/Data folder.


Incompatibility
===============
This mod will conflict with any other mod that modifies the DogCompanionRace.

Any other mod that uses the DogCompanionRace as a basis for their Dog Companions, will now have their dogs turned into foxes. However, most of them SHOULD be self-contained, so actually shouldn\'t conflict much.


Known Issues or Bugs
====================
Not really a bug or issue, but the foxes use the dog sounds on purpose.  Foxes DO actually bark.


History
=======
1.0, 2012/03/10 - Initial release.


Credits
=======
Thanks to Bethesda for creating Skyrim, the best game ever.
Thanks to NexusMods.com for the a one-stop-shop resource for authors and players.
Thanks to LHammonds for the Readme Generator this file was based on.
Thanks to r1de for testing these little critters for me.


Tools Used
==========
TESVSnip 
Construction Kit
Readme Generator


Licensing/Legal
===============
Do NOT upload this mod to the Steam Workshop.  Not a fan.
Otherwise, you can do whatever you want with this mod but all I ask in return is that you give me credit if you distribute any part of this mod. I would also like to know what mods are including my work.
author: MrSly
